text: Xa ke indoda iqhawule umtshato (izihlandlo ezithathu), akuyi kuba lilungelo ukuba abe ngumfazi wakhe kwakhona de atshatele kwenye indoda. Ukuba ke loo ndoda iye yaqhawula umtshato naye, akuyi kuba sisono kubo bobabini ukuba baphinde babuyelane (nendoda yakhe yokuqala), ukuba phofu baziva benokukwazi ukugcina imiqathango ebekwe nguAllâh. Le yimiqathango ebekwe nguAllâh, Ayenze yacaca kubantu abanolwazi
